name: Project Tiles A.5
description:
A combination of 3 previous tower defense games i never finished rolled into 1 big idea.

rogue-lite, Tower defense, Tile builder

its a mouthful i know...

Atm the path is randomly generated and populated

players are encouraged to maze the creep

ALL towers have the ability to be combined with another. In a sense...

when 2 towers combine they add or give their traits/abilities to another. this can be done unlimited times with any tower and allows you to build crazy doom towers capable of everything if you really wanted.

good luck and consider joining the Discord and helping me build my passion project up!
